name: fastapi-demo-app
description: A Wristband multi-tenant auth demo app. It uses a Python FastAPI backend server with a React frontend interacting with it.
author: Wristband

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm run frontend:clean && npm run backend:clean
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run frontend:install && npm run backend:install
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "green,yellow" "npm run backend" "sleep 3 && npm run frontend"
